DOC.brief_title: Impact Menstrual Cycle Antiretroviral Pharmacokinetics HIV-Infected Women
DOC.criteria: HIV positive female 2140 year age . Subjects must receive antiHIV regimen consist tenofovir , emtricitabine , atazanavir , ritonavir minimum 4 week prior study . Subjects must regular menstrual cycle ( period ) , define least 10 cycle year , occur approximately every 28 days+/ 4 day cycle length vary 7 day . Subjects breast feeding , pregnant , take oral contraceptive ( birth control pill ) least 3 month prior study . Subjects may intrauterine device ( IUD ) , Mirena , place prevent pregnancy .
